title: Olympic Medals Dashboard
summary: Comprehensive Tableau dashboard suite analyzing Olympic medals, participation, gender parity, and country dominance across decades. Designed for interactive exploration and storytelling.
process: Cleaned Olympic data and standardized country/sport fields for consistency
Created gender-based KPIs to analyze participation and medal equality over time
Designed multi-page dashboard with maps, time series, bar charts, and highlight tables
Added interactive controls (year, sport, gender, country) for self-serve analytics
Built USA-focused views showing medal distribution, gender trends, and dominating sports
Wrote annotations and tooltips that explain insights without requiring expert knowledge
Reviewed dashboards for performance, filter optimization, and mobile readability
impact: Enabled deeper understanding of global and US Olympic performance patterns
Highlighted impact of gender equity improvements over time
Demonstrated complex dashboard creation, data structuring, and exploratory analysis
Strengthened ability to present data narratives suitable for leadership dashboards
